title: Nydia Velázquez
deleted: Throughout her career as a U.S. Representative, Velázquez has consistently and fully supported pro-choice and family-planning interests groups such as the [[NARAL Pro-Choice America]] and the [[Planned Parenthood]]. She has consistently shown support of the National Farmers' Union. She has shown no support of interest groups that oppose animal rights.<ref name="Velasquez VoteSmart">{{cite web|title=Representative Nydia M. Velázquez|url=http://votesmart.org/candidate/26975/nydia-velazquez|publisher=VoteSmart|access-date=June 15, 2012}}</ref>

In 2009, Velázquez voted against the amendment Prohibiting Federally Funded Abortion Services. She has supported the Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations, the Unemployment Benefits Association, and the Unemployment Benefits Extension. Velázquez has also consistently voted for bills attempting to strengthen women's rights, such as the Employment Discrimination Law Amendments, Equal Pay Bill and the Inclusion of Consolidated Appropriations.<ref name="Velasquez VoteSmart"/>

title: Nydia Velázquez
added: As of September 2021, Velázquez had voted in line with [[Joe Biden]]'s stated position 100% of the time.<ref>{{cite web |last1=Bycoffe |first1=Anna Wiederkehr and Aaron |title=Does Your Member Of Congress Vote With Or Against Biden? |url=https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/biden-congress-votes/nydia-m-velzquez/|website=FiveThirtyEight |access-date=8 September 2021 |language=en |date=2021-04-22}}</ref>
